articles.title: Apple's Multi-Year iPhone Cycle And App Store Dynamics Are Growth Catalysts: Analyst
articles.content: BofA Securities analyst Wamsi Mohan maintained a Buy rating on Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) with a price target of $256. The analyst cited the multi-year iPhone upgrade cycle, tailwinds to gross margin, and strong cash flows as factors for rating reiteration. The analyst writes that, as per SensorTower data, App Store revenues in first-quarter FY25 (after 64 days) rose to $5.6 billion, a 15.2% year-over-year increase.
